Composting and Biomass Management

Composting and biomass management (of crop residues and/or manure) are fundamental for nutrient and water-holding capacity and healthy soil life.

See here an excellent animated video about proper biomass management and composting and learn about the benefits and on how to do it.




See here a real-life farm video on how to build a good compost pile and how to use the biomass available on a farm.




The following poster shows all relevant facts in detail. Have a look at it.
